name: mcp-server-aws-finch
description: Build and push container images using Finch, with ECR repository management and AWS integration

rating.reason: Good documentation overall with comprehensive descriptions and clear parameter documentation. Tool names are specific and intuitive. Descriptions effectively explain functionality, usage context, and limitations including ECR integration details and read-only mode behavior. Parameter descriptions are clear with helpful examples. Minor areas for improvement include some verbose descriptions and a few parameters that could benefit from more specific constraint details (e.g., valid platform formats, progress output types).
